name: International Conference on Pediatrics & Neonatology
content: Universal Pannel heartily welcome to have your presence at the International Conference on Pediatrics & Neonatology' which is going to be held on June 20 -21, 2024 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and that impact the advancements and technology trends in Pediatrics. The theme of the conference is ' The Future Innovation of Pediatrics and Neonatology'.Our Pediatrics & Nanotechnology Scientific Programming Committee is busy planning plenary, seminars, meeting the expert sessions, workshops, abstract and poster sessions, discussions, and debates. We will offer you a scientific program that covers the latest in best practices, research, guidelines, and technology from around the world.
